human_service_dashboard.title: Human support
human_service_dashboard.peaks_in_human_service: Peak of open chats per hour

tooltips.in_progress: Total number of chats currently being handled.
tooltips.response_time: Average time the contact waits to receive a reply to each message.
tooltips.waiting_time: The average time contacts spend waiting for their chats to be initiated.
tooltips.awaiting_service: The number of contacts waiting for an agent to initiate the chat.
tooltips.closeds: Total number of chats that have been completed.

tooltips.total: Total conversations started in the period. A conversation is  counted 24 hours after the contact's first message.
tooltips.resolved: Resolved Conversation: The contact interacted with questions/requests and received responses that helped complete the demand (total or partial).
tooltips.unresolved: Unresolved Conversation: The contact interacted with questions/requests,  but the conversation didn't resolve the demand (totally or partially).
tooltips.unengaged: Conversation without useful engagement: The conversation was limited to greetings, emojis, or was ended without relevant interaction.
tooltips.transferred: Includes conversations (resolved or unresolved) that were forwarded to a human agent.

form_topic.title: Edit topics and sub-topics
form_topic.context_description: Add a context to improve the AI classification

remove_modal.description_remove_topic: Are you sure you want to remove the {topic} topic? All sub-topics will also be removed, and any data previously associated with this topic will be unclassified and no longer accessible through this classification.
remove_modal.description_remove_sub_topic: Are you sure you want to remove the {sub_topic} sub-topic? Any data previously associated with this subtopic will be unclassified and no longer accessible through this classification.

cancel_modal.title: Cancel editing topics
cancel_modal.description_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel? All progress will be lost.

most_talked_about_topics.title: Most talked about topics
most_talked_about_topics.no_topics_description: Add the topics you want to track. The AI will automatically tag every conversation with them, then youâ€™ll see the most talked-about subjects right here.

customize_your_dashboard.title: Customize your dashboard
customize_your_dashboard.description: Customize the dashboard with your key metrics
customize_your_dashboard.csat_description: The Customer Satisfaction Score indicates the contact level of satisfaction with the service received.
customize_your_dashboard.nps_description: The Net Promoter Score indicates how likely contact are to recommend the service they received to others.

generate_insight.title: Generate insight
generate_insight.error: We're sorry, but unfortunately we were unable to generate an Insight, please check your internet connection or try again later
generate_insight.prompt: Analyze the performance of a human service operation's results dashboard. The dashboard displays three main categories: calls in progress, closed and waiting. In addition, evaluate the following metrics: first response time, waiting time and interaction time. Identify efficiency patterns, possible bottlenecks in the service flow and offer suggestions for optimizing response time and team productivity. Data: {values}
